amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 210 that provided for the exclusive jurisdiction of Alabama, Louisiana, and Mississippi over fish in the Gulf of Mexico within 9 miles of their coast.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional record to strike sec. 210 that specifies the exclusive jurisdiction of Alabama, Louisiana, and Mississippi over fish in the Gulf of Mexico within 9 miles of the coast of the state.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
